channel.title: 转载 on 困惑的人生
channel.description: Recent content in 转载 on 困惑的人生

item.title: Openstack Instance Ha Propersal
item.description: This post is a copy from russellbryant In a perfect world, every workload that runs on OpenStack would be a cloud native application that is horizontally scalable and fault tolerant to anything that may cause a VM to go down. However, the reality is quite different. We continue to see a high demand for support of traditional workloads running on top of OpenStack and the HA expectations that come with them.
